'''14w20b''' is the twenty-fourth [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.8]], released on May 15, 2014, to fix some of the bugs and crashes in [[14w20a]].<ref>{{cite|url=https://web.archive.org/web/20140425132002/https://mojang.com/2014/05/minecraft-snapshot-14w20a/|title=Minecraft snapshot 14w20b|date=May 15, 2014|website=Mojang.com|author=[[Dinnerbone]]}}</ref>

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=14w20a|prefix=Minecraft
|;old
|51758|Some users have multiple UUID records for <code>agent:minecraft</code>.
|;prev
|55204|Mob entities appear to spawn then despawn rapidly.
|55220|Scoreboard objectives no longer show in list.
}}</onlyinclude>

== Trivia ==
* 14w20b was previously removed from the [[launcher]] for some time, but was added back in September 2018.
